## ComposeReturn type

Return type: Promise if lazy modules present

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ComposeReturn<T extends readonly Module[]> = ContainsLazy<T> extends true ? Promise<Use<ComposedContext<T>>> : Use<ComposedContext<T>>;
```
**References:** [Module](../module/)<!-- -->, [ContainsLazy](../containslazy/)<!-- -->, [Use](../use/)<!-- -->, [ComposedContext](../composedcontext/)
